bodydiv.p: The acquirer shall measure a group of contracts within the scope of IFRS 17 Insurance Contracts acquired in a business combination, and any assets for insurance acquisition cash flows as defined in IFRS 17, as a liability or asset in accordance with paragraphs 39 and B93–B95F of IFRS 17, at the acquisition date.
